resources.string: Remember, keep using your Banking App when you travel, as it is the most reliable and secure way to bank outside South Africa.\n\nEnjoy your trip.
Before your departure, check Temporary lock to make sure that international transactions are unlocked
If you are travelling for longer than 60 days at a time, re-activate your card for travel use before your first 60 days abroad ends.
If you are travelling for longer than 60 days, you will need to reactivate your card for travel use before the first 60 days abroad end.
Please select the departure date first
